title.narrative: Frame Agreement with NGO (Finn Church Aid)

description.narrative: The project is a continuation of the existing project that started in 2014 implemented in Northern Uganda by Uganda Change Agent Association (UCAA). The long periods of war in northern Uganda left livelihood options/opportunities limited and undiversified, low productivity, severely depressed employment and incomes and a fragile local economy mainly dependent on external support. The preparation of the project follows requests by women in the project area to expand the existing project in other areas close to the project area. Objectives:? To increase income for 900 women through establishment and management of viable income generating activities by 2017? To increase involvement and participation of women in socio-economic development? To improve skills and knowledge of 900 women to manage their businesses, professionally and profitably by 2017Activities: ? Group formation, leadership trainings? Mobilisation of women groups? Training in business skills? Training in improved agricultural practice? Trainings in IGA? Trainings in VSLAs? Formation of VSLAs groups? Baseline studyRights-holders /beneficiaries: 30 women groups with 900 members Implementing partner:The project will be implemented by Uganda Change Agent Association (UCAA). The partner has been one of t he oldest partners with FCA and has experience working with women groups.
